definitions.title: n.[m.]pl.
definitions.body: pistachio, an oval nut (cf. As. buṭnu COT:Gloss & Schr:MBAK 1881, 419, Aram. [[בּוּטְנׇא]], bet.mto0, Ar. but.mun; on Punic Boutnou/m Blau:ZMG 1873, 527) = pistacia terebinthus Rob:BR i. 208, ii. 222, Post:PEF Oct. 1888, 218, No. 214 f; Tr. Vict. Inst. xxii. 271 etc. pist. vera Löw:No. 44); Ge 43:11 one of the articles carried from Canaan to Egypt by sons of Jacob as present to Joseph; still a delicacy in Egypt and Syria, cf.Wetzst in Löw:p.420.
